synopsis.text: He is Kuzuki Kakyou, a dreamgazer of Dragons of Earth, who finds himself caught between the realms of past and future. In his dreams, he encounters a young woman of extraordinary spirit, witnessing her life's journey and eventual demise. As he delves deeper into his visions, he uncovers a future laden with tragedy, where the very existence of Earth hangs in the balance. This poignant prequel to the 'X' TV series invites viewers to embark on a thought-provoking journey, exploring the intricate tapestry of dreams, memories, and prophecies woven by the enigmatic Kakyou.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
